ygData.subject: Re: Finally...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I still use the wad of coin approach.  cost is about 30 plat with failures for spy glasses. Gnome gone mad. =====
ygData.messageBody:
--- Ioshua <Ioshua@...> wrote:
> From: Ioshua <Ioshua@...>
>
> I'm very glad we all finally have the ability to
> make it, not that it
> is more than novelty but hey, at least we can make
> jokes about our
> extendable rods *smirk*... On a more grim note, at
> what skill can you
> start making the spyglass? I tried once last night
> and bombed, not
> having another 20pp to drop I decided to wait until
> I was a more mature
> gnome or at least had a big wad-o-coin to pump into
> this venture. And
> yes, fireworks seem too pooped to pop.

I still use the wad of coin approach. cost is about
30 plat with failures for spy glasses.

Gnome gone mad.

=====
